title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Beat eggs with cheese. Combine pasta with pancetta and eggs. Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in tikka paste. Grill chicken. Fry onion and add tomatoes. Add cream and grilled chicken. Simmer until cooked.
